Question: This person underwent bypass surgery on August 7, 2012, to relieve blocked coronary arteries.
Hints: This person left the Navy at age 22 on August 23, 1952, and became a Lieutenant, Junior Grade, in the U.S Naval Reserve.
This person later completed his master of science degree in aeronautical engineering at the University of Southern California.
This person was also inducted into the Aerospace Walk of Honor and the United States Astronaut Hall of Fame.
